isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Diamond Logic® Engine Brake - Installation - High-pressure Oil Manifold (Brake)

step1.para: Back off all brake actuator piston lash adjustments, for correct high-pressure oil manifold bolt torque during high-pressure oil manifold installation.

figure.caption: Injector oil inlet adaptor installed in high-pressure oil manifold

step1.para: Verify that six injector oil inlet adaptor oil outlet tubes move and are not frozen. Inspect injector oil inlet adaptors for internal O-ring extrusion and high-pressure oil leak paths. Replace any adaptor which has an extruded internal O-ring, frozen oil outlet tube, or high-pressure oil leak path.

Install injector oil inlet adaptors with Injector Adaptor Removal Tool
. Tighten injector oil inlet adaptors to special torque .
Install new backup rings and injector oil inlet seals on all oil inlet adaptors that were not replaced.
Coat backup rings and injector oil inlet seals with clean engine oil.
Coat new oil inlet O-ring with clean engine oil and install in cylinder head recess.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, get assistance to remove and install the high-pressure oil manifold assembly.

step1.para: With help from an assistant, lift the high-pressure oil manifold up and carefully place on engine.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, carefully align six injector oil inlet ports with six injector oil inlet adaptors of the high-pressure oil manifold before tightening oil manifold bolts.

step1.para: Carefully align six injector oil inlet ports with six injector oil inlet adapters of the high-pressure oil manifold and firmly push down to "snap" manifold in place.
Install and finger tighten 12 M8 x 90 bolts securing high-pressure oil manifold to the cylinder head.

figure.caption: High-pressure oil manifold bolt torque sequence

step1.para: Tighten 12 high-pressure oil manifold M8 x 90 bolts to in the proper torque sequence to 30 N·m (22 lbf·ft).

Adjust Engine Brake Lash
for all cylinders.

note.para: Air trapped in the high-pressure oil manifold will be purged automatically during cranking and start up.
